title: Prime Location in Coventry Village near Hospitals CCF, UH, CWRU
neighborhood: Cleveland Heights near Cleveland Clinic Univ Hosp CWRU Med
posting_body: Old world charm found in a brownstone walk-up with high ceilings.
Spacious and Bright one bedroom suite has hardwood floors throughout with high ceilings.
Dining room is open to the Living Room separated by an archway.
Bathroom has floor-to-ceiling marble with a jetted tub.
Kitchen is open to Dining Room and has dishwasher & disposal.
Ceiling fan in Living Room provide for great circulation, with an air conditioner window unit.
Living area has great storage closets.
Close to public transportation, restaurants, library, shopping, CCF, CWRU, UH, Metro, and VA hospitals.
Call Two One Six 536-64O5 for more options, to schedule an appointment or answer any questions.
When replying to this email, please provide your phone number for a quick response.
